title: Bonus Episode: "Goat" by James McBride
description: A well-meaning teacher discovers a student's talent, and in the process of helping out his family, bites off more than she can chew. Recorded live at the Now Hear This festival. This story appears in James McBride's collection FIVE CARAT SOUL, available now from Riverhead Books.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
